item.title: City Fish
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:

The post City Fish appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
City Fish is in the heart of downtown. It’s a great, laid back seafood place that cranks out great food. It’s a place that we enjoy going to when we’re in the mood for quality seafood at decent prices.

Pictured at the top was the chef’s special of the evening in almond crusted corvina. I had never heard of the corvina fish, but was told it is a flakey white fish similar in style to mahi. I was sold. Man was it good.

Also pictured is the macaroni and cheese and fried pickles that also graced the table, both of which are delicious.

At the bottom is the fried Oreo dessert. If you haven’t tried a fried Oreo, you don’t really know what you’re missing and at City Fish they do it right by throwing them in a bed of ice cream. It’s a great way to close out the meal.

City Fish is found on Central near the corner of Summerlin downtown.

The post City Fish appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
